# From Data Science - A First Intro with Python

## Pandas Rehash

Extracting only the relevant rows corresponding to Aboriginal languages, and only keeping the `language` and `mother_tongue` columns.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt

with pd.option_context(
    "compute.use_numba",
    True,
    "display.max_rows",
    20,
    "display.max_columns",
    12,
    "display.html.use_mathjax",
    True,
    "io.parquet.engine",
    "pyarrow",
    "styler.render.max_columns",
    20,
    "styler.format.precision",
    4,
):
    pass

can_lang_df = pd.read_csv(
    "./introduction-to-datascience-python/source/data/can_lang.csv"
)
```
